Sentencas: Porous palygorskite (Pal) was mixed with Ho0.9Sr0.1Cr0.5Fe0.5O3.delta (HSCF) perovskite to prepare a novel cathode material for SOFC due to large specific surface area and nano-scaled internal channels.
Titulo: Palygorskite mixed with Ho-based perovskite as a promising cathode material for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Calcination of HSCF was preceded under 1000 degrees C by Thermogravimetry and differential scanning calorimetry techniques (TG-DSC) and X-ray diffraction (XRD) analysis.
Titulo: Palygorskite mixed with Ho-based perovskite as a promising cathode material for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Field emission scanning electron microscopy (FESEM) and IR manifested that Pal was mixed homogeneously with HSCF.
Titulo: Palygorskite mixed with Ho-based perovskite as a promising cathode material for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Brunauer-Emmett-Teller (BET) analysis proved that surface areas of cathode increased from 0.18 m(2) g(-1) to 4.23 m(2) g(-1) after mixing with palygorskite.
Titulo: Palygorskite mixed with Ho-based perovskite as a promising cathode material for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: In addition, the performances of the single cell (NiO GDC vertical bar GDC vertical bar HSCF GDC and NiO-GDC vertical bar GDC vertical bar HSCF-Pal-GDC) were also measured at 450-550 degrees C when the 99% H-2 and ambient air were fuels of anode and cathode, respectively.
Titulo: Palygorskite mixed with Ho-based perovskite as a promising cathode material for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Corresponding the maximum power density were 14.32 mW.cm(-2) and 28.43 mW.cm(-2) at 500 degrees C. When the single cell operating temperature was raised to 550 degrees C, the performance of single cell NiO-GDC vertical bar GDC vertical bar HSCF-GDC continues to enhance, while another ome decreased sharply.
Titulo: Palygorskite mixed with Ho-based perovskite as a promising cathode material for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: BET values of the cathode with mixing Pal after cell test declined from 4.23 m(2) g(-1) to 0.11 m(2) g(-1), which indicated the collapsing of the pores in Pal at the cell operating temperature and impeded the performance of the cell.
Titulo: Palygorskite mixed with Ho-based perovskite as a promising cathode material for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The operating temperature of the single cell after mixing Pal in electrode couldn't exceed 500 degrees C.
Titulo: Palygorskite mixed with Ho-based perovskite as a promising cathode material for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The electrochemical impedance spectra (EIS) was also used to analysis the factors influencing cell performance.
Titulo: Palygorskite mixed with Ho-based perovskite as a promising cathode material for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Therefore, HSCF-Pal as a promising cathode can be used as low temperature solid oxide fuel cell.
Titulo: Palygorskite mixed with Ho-based perovskite as a promising cathode material for solid oxide fuel cell
